name: who-1
author: skyler
title: Who he iz
body:
Experimenter. Adventurer. Engineer. Artist.

These are all things people use to describe me.

I live in the DC Metro area for the time being, and a travel like a beast.

Motorcycling is my second major addiction; this is my bike. Coffee is my first, and if you've never had Zeke's Coffee before, you're missing out on some glorious, fantastical joe.

If you'd like more than this elevator pitch, here's a good resource.
